et: French {it}sémite{/it}, from {it}Sem{/it} Shem, from Late Latin, from Greek {it}Sēm{/it}, from Hebrew {it}Shēm{/it}

dt: {bc}a person who has a hostile, prejudiced attitude toward Jews {bc}an {d_link|anti-Semitic|anti-Semitic} person

dt.t: The {wi}anti-Semites{/wi} of his day insisted that Disraeli was bogus in every respect but his identification with Jews and Judaism.

shortdef: a person who has a hostile, prejudiced attitude toward Jews : an anti-Semitic person

dt: {bc}hostility toward or discrimination against Jews as a religious, ethnic, or racial group

shortdef: hostility toward or discrimination against Jews as a religious, ethnic, or racial group
